headline: Top executive Publicis gloats over Omnicom-IPG merger
summary: Copyright © Emerce 2023Top executive Arthur Sadoun of advertising giant Publicis cannot wait for the merger of its competitors Omnicom and IPG. In a video to his employees, he explains why.Should...
